short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Walmart product research made easy. See rank, estimated sales volume, estimated revenue and more without entering the product page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Analytics to Grow Your Walmart Business. Our chrome extension overlays information as you browse walmart.com. Find profitable products to sell 10x faster, and spy on competitors to stay ahead.


Trusted by Walmart sellers, the Bizmetrica Chrome Extension is designed to help you…  

 ✓ Leverage powerful data to assess market demand and validate product opportunities 
✓ Discover new product niches with upfront search-volume data 
✓ Gain a comprehensive overview of your competition 
✓ Calculate potential profit margins with Profitability Calculator 
✓ Identify buyer trends with graphs over time such as price, verified reviews, product ranking and more


Simplify Product Research OpportunityExplorer
Search for a product and launch OpportunityExplorer on Walmart to unlock vital niche sales data that can help you identify winning product niches. Eliminate uncertainty and back your business decisions with accurate data to assess competition and demand. 

Estimate Margins on the Fly with Profitability Calculator
Gauge a product’s potential sales success with the Profitability Calculator. Generate accurate sales margins and ROI by assessing all the fees and costs associated to make better sourcing decisions.

Spy on Your Competitors' Listing Stock with Inventory Levels
Spy on your competition’s available units for sale with Inventory Levels. Discover who your real competitors are and if you have any potential hijackers on your listing.  

Find Suppliers on Alibaba.com with Supplier Finder
Use Supplier Finder, powered by our partner Alibaba.com, to find quality product suppliers faster and easier while conducting your research on Walmart!

Avoid making wrong decisions. With trends over time historical graphs
Identify the best times to buy or sell products. You don't want to waste money purchasing inventory on a product that won't sell until next year while Walmart charges you storage fees.You don't want to sell products where price is decreasing over time, and profitability is shrinking.
